content.title: Eiffel Tower
content.body: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris, France.

content.title: Louvre Museum
content.body: The Louvre is the world's most-visited museum, and a historic landmark in Paris.

content.title: Arc de Triomphe
content.body: The Arc de Triomphe is one of the most famous monuments in Paris.
